paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Litigators
detailsData.content: Our team has decades of experience in complex litigation, providing our clients with a winning strategy for each unique case.

detailsData.title: Community Engagement
detailsData.content: We are actively involved in the community, serving on boards and providing pro bono services to give back.

detailsData.title: Judgment and Strategy
detailsData.content: Our attorneys use their judgment and experience to find the best strategies for our clients, whether through aggressive litigation or creative problem-solving.

address: 201 Mission Street, Suite 1330, San Francisco, CA 94105
subHeading: Years of experience in finding the winning strategy for each unique case
valueProp: Gluck Daniel Atkinson is a team of talented lawyers in a culture defined by teamwork, integrity, creativity, and excellence.

testimonalData.text: Gluck Daniel Atkinson provided exceptional legal representation for my case. Their team was professional and dedicated to achieving the best outcome.

testimonalData.text: I was impressed by the strategic approach taken by the attorneys at Gluck Daniel Atkinson. They were thorough and effective in handling my legal matter.

testimonalData.text: The team at Gluck Daniel Atkinson went above and beyond to ensure my legal needs were met. I highly recommend their services.
